meanings.sent1: The talented frescoers carefully painted the walls of the cathedral.
meanings.sent2: The frescoers were hired to decorate the historic building with beautiful artwork.
meanings.sent3: The group of frescoers joked about painting each other's portraits on the walls.
meanings.sent4: The frescoers were like human brushes, bringing life to the dull walls.
meanings.sent5: The frescoers' work transformed the room into a colorful masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: Watching the frescoers at work was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The frescoers' dedication to their craft was evident in every stroke.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended to be frescoers, painting imaginary scenes on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent4: The frescoers' movements were as graceful as dancers on a canvas.
meanings.sent5: The room smelled of paint as the frescoers worked tirelessly on the mural.

meanings.definition: The art or technique of painting frescoes.
meanings.sent1: Learning about the history of frescoers was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The frescoers' skill in blending colors was unmatched.
meanings.sent3: The art class studied the techniques of famous frescoers from the past.
meanings.sent4: The secrets of the ancient frescoers were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed the tools used by renowned frescoers throughout history.
